SELECT GRADES.L_ABR_CRSNO AS L_ABR_CRSNO , DECODE ( :paramLocale , 'ar', A_CRSSNM , CRS.CRSSNM ) AS COURSE_NAME , GRADES.GRADECD AS GRADE_CODE , DECODE ( :paramLocale , 'ar', GV.A_ABR_GVAL , GV.L_ABR_GVAL ) AS GRADE
FROM GRADE_VAL GV , STD_GRADES GRADES , CRS_BASIC CRS
WHERE
GRADES.STDNO = :paramStdNo AND GRADES.CCYRCD=:paramYear AND GRADES.SEMCD=:paramSem AND GV.GRADECD = GRADES.GRADECD AND CRS.CRSNO = GRADES.CRSNO
UPDATE STD_GRADES SET GRADECD = :paramGradeCode WHERE STDNO = :paramStdNo AND CCYRCD=:paramYear AND SEMCD=:paramSem AND L_ABR_CRSNO = :paramCourseLAbrCode
